name: Scared of the Dark (JackMcG)
description:
Update (22/02): HTML, Windows and Linux versions should now run.

Created for the Godot Wild Gamejam #30. Theme is 'Heartbeat'. 

Also the first game I've ever made!

Credit: 

Music: Philippe Groarke – Dark Ambience ©. https://opengameart.org/content/dark-ambiance.  (CC BY-SA 3.0)

Tilemap by Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/).
